name: Luisa Lima
bio: I started working with Ruby 6 years ago and immediately fell in <3 with its elegance and expressiveness. However, one of the things that (still) appeals to me the most is the incredibly savvy, creative and welcoming community behind it. I'm grateful for the opportunity to be a part of it via this amazing project!

name: Gabi Stefanini
bio: I'm a production engineer/dev ops who has been working with Ruby applications for the last 2 years and I love it <3
